text: Sir Richard Charles Scrimgeour Shepherd (6 December 1942 – 19 or 21 February 2022) was a British Conservative politician. He was Member of Parliament for Aldridge-Brownhills from 1979 to 2015. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Aberdeen Category:Politicians from West Midlands (county)
title: Richard Shepherd
